ValidationRule.description: The Passenger Name should contain only letters
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"0" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"1" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"2" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"3" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"4" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"5" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"6" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"7" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"8" ), CONTAINS(Passenger_s_Name__c ,"9" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your Name should only contain letters
